about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of quadrobers!

Immerse yourself in a unique universe where children transform into animals, put on masks and move on their paws, exploring large worlds. In this game, you will find quadrober adventures, many levels and unique characters that drop out randomly at the beginning of each game.

"I Am Quadrober!" is a realistic collision simulator with active physics of characters and objects. You can launch a character into free fall simulating various situations, jump over obstacles, adjust the physical parameters of the character and even fall from rides or crazy spinning wheels.

Features:

  • Large worlds: Explore a variety of locations, from dense forests to crazy rides.

  • Destructibility: Demolish huge structures with the most realistic physics* of falls. Adjust the weight, the force of the fall and choose the skeleton for maximum realism.

  • Many levels: Unlock new levels and complete them to get achievements.

  • Random characters: You can play as a Quadrober Deer (boy) and a Quadrober Fox (girl). Customize your character's settings right in the game and show everyone how much you love quadrobbing.

  • Goal: Complete all the levels and collect all the achievements. But remember, if you don't feel like a quadrober, you can't do it. Not everyone knows how difficult the life of a quadrober can be.

Launch your quadrober and demonstrate your skills to the world!

*According to the World Wild Quadrober Foundation

name: I Am Quadrober!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: Are you ready to take on the challenge and become the best quadrober? Join us and prove that you are a true master of quadrobbing!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Japanese
